Key Match Events: Rangers came back from a two-run deficit twice in the game
Wild pitch in the sixth inning led to a run for Texas
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Smith praised the team's resilience
Manager Bruce Bochy highlighted the importance of the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Roof was open at Globe Life Field for the first time since May
Angels had multiple injuries with Jo Adell and Kevin Pillar on the IL
Rangers' Jacob deGrom and Max Scherzer were rehabbing
Others: Game was important for Texas Rangers' playoff hopes
